details.message: User creation should succeed

Verifiable credentials should integrate properly
API calls should complete within 5 seconds (took 596ms)
Verification engine should process certificates within 10 seconds

Application should not have memory leaks
User authentication should be secure

All API endpoints should validate input
Database queries should be protected against SQL injection
User input should be sanitized to prevent XSS
API endpoints should be protected against CSRF attacks
JWT/JWS tokens should be properly signed and validated
